runs.comm: Malinga strikes first ball! Nice and full, swings in, close to 140ks, to rap the pad in front. It would have taken out the leg stump
full and swinging down the leg side, wide
near yorker on the leg stump, clipped to square leg
length and outside off, poked to cover
slow dipping full toss, something Malinga had perfected during the 2009 WT20, the batsman has a wry smile. He prods it towards midwicket
pretty full on leg, whipped to midwicket, the fielder cuts the angle, but misses the direct hit. Herath dives but can't back up the throw

double-blow from Malinga. This was a little over 20ks slower than the first ball. 113.7ks, in fact. Shahzad has a leaden-footed drive at it. The ball slithers under the bat to hit the off stump. Shahzad was through with the shot. Malinga is back at work. There is that roar!
pitched up on off, pushed to mid-off
full and bends in on middle and leg, worked to mid-on
Kaleem skips out, the bowler chases him and hits the pad as the ball rolls to the off side
back of a length on middle, defended down the ground
length ball on off, blocked to cover on the front foot

Siri spills a dolly at slip. Good length ball, tight line around off. The batsman aims a leg-side flick and ends up edging to Siri who makes a mess of it. He was on the move as he grabbed at it with both hands
full and outside off, crisply driven to the covers
bumper from Malinga, boings off the surface, it even has the keeper leaping and then tumbling. Usman avoids it
dipping slow full toss outside off, slid to point
full and hurtles in to ping the pad, but this was going down leg
yorker outside off, jammed to cover
very full and angled in from round the stumps, he twirls his wrists and puts it away wide of midwicket
full on middle, Malinga slips in a slower ball. Usman spots it and plays it back to the bowler
back of a length and jags in, dragged behind square off the inside half

Kula gets Kaleem now. Length ball on off, Kaleem wants to go over mid-off. He can only miscue it to the fielder. Malinga and Kula have tipped the scales in SL's favour. Mathews catches it around chest height
fuller length and curves away outside off, past the outside edge
full on middle and leg, clipped through backward square leg

Kula gets another. Usman dances out for a leg-side slog. He can only send a thick edge to slip around head height. Good catch from Kapu, but poor shot selection on the part of Usman. The chase is in tatters at 16 for 4
full and largely holds its line outside off, the batsman pushes out and misses
short, angled in, takes the thigh
dug in short and just outside off, dirty slog past midwicket, beating Kapu in the deep
short with extra lift outside off, chopped towards point
dug in short on off, Shaiman looks to pull but does not connect
short and angled in, punched to the left of mid-on
shorter again, Shaiman skipped out and mowed it over cow corner
good length and nips in to beat the batsman
full and curls in to catch the pad as the batsman plays all round it
darted onto the hips, diverted to long leg
short and ducks in, Shaiman flashes it back to the bowler
back of a length and nips in, tucked to midwicket
slanting down leg, wide called
pitched up and outside off, knocked to cover
good length and nibbles in on off, played back to the bowler
length and comes in, he inches forward and pushes towards mid-off
short and angled in, Anwar hangs back and clips it through midwicket
Anwar uses his feet, meets a short ball, jams it onto his pad. He pinches a single
back of a length on off, worked defensively towards midwicket
back of a length on off again, Patil steps out, picks it up and drop-kicks it over backward square leg
looped up on middle, nudged to square leg
flighed on middle, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
drifts in, down the track and flicked to the left of the diving Malinga at short midwicket
pushed through quicker, drifts in, and then breaks away to beat the batsman. He drives and misses
slides on outside off, Anwar skips back to cut a ball that was neither too short nor too wide. He can only edge it behind to the keeper. The UAE procession continues
worked off the pads behind square for one
rising short ball outside off, poked to the left of second slip off an outside edge
short and zips away outside off, thudding into Chandi's gloves. Left alone
bouncer at 143ks, forcing the batsman to crouch low and get under it
short ball, hits the splice of the bat. Fended back to the bowler
bumper outside off, the batsman drops his hands on it. Too high, says the square-leg umpire. Wide
short and slanting away outside off, Haider is crease bound as he chases it with a cut. The ball bounces past the top edge
short and skirts away outside off with extra bounce, beating the batsman
tossed up, drifts in on middle, he skips down the track and lifts it inside out, clears the long-off fielder
flighted and drifts in to take the pad. It would have bounced over, says the tracker
slides in on off, he uses his feet and goes for another inside-out shot. This is carved over the covers
pushed back to the bowler, Herath puts in a dive, giving more work to the creaking knees

flighted and full outside off, Haider attempts a big slog. He can only sky a catch to Chandimal off a big top edge. UAE are falling away quickly. Two each for Malinga, Kula, and Herath. Chandimal took a few paces forward to take it in front of the batsman
slides on middle, poked back to the bowler from the crease
short and angled in, he has Patil hopping and fending to the off side
bumpy ball outside off, beats the batsman
short and wide outside off, slapped to point
short and ducks back in to hit the thigh
Patil stands tall and punches this short ball from outside off through the covers
back of a length on middle at 142ks, hits the bat hard. Played back to the bowler
darted on off, skids on, chops through the off side
full on middle, paddled down to long leg
leg-side ball, helped to the same fielder
tossed up and drifts in to take the front pad, but this was heading down the leg side
pushed through down leg, swept fine on the leg side
down the track and flicked through square leg. Patil wants two but has to settle with one
full on off, pushed back to the bowler
slides on outside off, uses his feet and blasts it to long-off
shortish on off, whipped to cow corner on the back foot. A fumble allows the second
fired outside off, flash and a miss
full and wide outside off, the batsman throws his hands at it and carves it to the left of long-off
pushed through outside off, he uses the pace of Siri, opens the face, and runs it down to third man for four
strays down leg side first ball, the batsman moved across his stumps to glance but was too far away
moves back and towards the off to steer a length ball to third man
huge appeal for lbw, was there an inside edge? The batsman came forward to flick to the leg side and was beaten on the inside edge by the slower one. That looked close, quite plumb in fact
hit through midwicket for a single
short ball, the batsman backs away and pulls but is beaten
good length angling towards the off stump, the batsman stays in his crease and defends awkwardly
short of a length and slower too, beats the dab to third man
Chameera spears the first ball nearly into the blockhole, the batsman digs it out on the leg side
the batsman hops back and pushes frantically at a good length ball angling into him at pace, he gets a leading edge that falls where silly mid off would have been
tries to slog to midwicket from outside off but is beaten
this time he makes contact, moving back, clearing his front foot and slamming the slog to the deep midwicket boundary
short of a length and wide outside off but somehow he manages to pull the ball wide of mid on for four more
angles into the right-hander, he was looking to defend but the ball goes to third man off the thigh, the batsman is in pain
full and outside off, he comes forward and lashes a drive to the left of long-on They push for two.... they will have to settle with one
drifts into the hips, swung away through square leg with some flourish
full and outside off, down the track and drilled fiercely past the bowler, long-off now moves to his right to cut off
Patil steps out and whips it down to long-on
fired at 94ks, following the moving batsman, carved to backward point
slides on off, heaved to wide long-on off the inside half of the bat
dipping full toss, backs away and hoicks it onto his pad
full and swerves away outside off, the batman reaches out. He is on the move as he dabs and misses
Patil nips down the track and goes for a wild heave-ho. This is slanted outside off. Might have been just inside the tramline. But it has been deemed a wide

Malinga's slower ball does the trick, again. Short and around off at 117.7ks, Patil looks to go over midwicket. He can only lob it in the air off the leading edge. Malinga follows the ball, runs to his left, and takes it near the short-cover region
full toss on middle, whipped through backward square leg
slower ball outside off, he goes for a big swing and misses
length and outside off, reaches out and carves it in the air over mid-off
slower full ball on middle from the back of the hand,100ks, swung away to deep midwicket
comes down the track and yorks himself. Sliced away to backward point
full and straight, might have stopped on the batsman. Chipped in front of long-on
Kapu completes a fine overhead catch at long-off. Length ball on off, Amjad clears his front leg and swings it. Kapu judges it well and takes it. Amjad got the elevation but not the desired distance
full toss on middle, which is hit to cover
off-stump yorker, dug out through mid-on
beamer down the leg side, Raza ducks under it. Over the waistline, deemed a no-ball
yorker outside off at 136ks, jammed behind to the keeper
Malinga nails another yorker, homes in on middle, jabbed past midwicket
137ks, Malinga hurls another perfect yorker, dug out
full and outside off, Naveed slashes hard but can't make contact
fullish and outside off, Naveed makes swinging room by backing away. He can only slice it in the air to Mathews at cover. Malinga has blown UAE away
slower ball floated outside off, he is early into the shot. Pokes an outside edge to third man
beamer down the leg side, the ball slips out of the hand. Runs away to the fine leg boundary
backs away to a free-hit ball. This is a yorker following the batsman, jammed to long-on
Raza makes room, he gets a full toss, which is carved through point
another beamer, this is hurled at 142ks, Chameera has been taken out of the attack. He looks to hook, but is caught in a tangle. Lobbed towards square leg
Quadeer skips out, he meets a short ball, and flat-bats it to cover
nice slower ball outside off, swing and a miss. They pinch a bye
short, slower ball outside off at 111.4ks, flat-bat thump over the bowler's head
full on middle, down the track and belted to cover
